definition: to have an opportunity that one can exploit (idiom)
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
four horse military chariot (archaic)/four (archaic)/generic term for history books
to ride/to mount/to make use of/to avail oneself of/to take advantage of/to multiply (math.)/Buddhist sect or creed

sentences.english: Lax security allowed the thieves to enter.
sentences.chinese: 鬆懈的保安措施使小偷有機可乘。

sentences.english: Nine younger sister dont want to let Kim annul, said he is only go for a walk.
sentences.chinese: 九妹不願讓金珠有機可乘，只說自己是出去走一走。
